amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? LIMITATION ON ECONOMIC SUPPORT FUND ASSISTANCE FOR MEXICO ? SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act under the heading "ECONOMIC SUPPORT FUND" may be used to provide assistance for Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill under the heading Economic Support Fund to provide assistance to Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 311 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
